content.question: Which of the following best explains how a supporter of free trade and market deregulation would counter Sorosâ€™ critiques of free markets in the passage?

choices.label: Soros fails to acknowledge the fact that capitalist states continue to promote economic inequality between corporations and workers despite the adoption of social safety nets.
Soros ignores the fact that government deregulation of financial systems has led to the most serious economic crises in the twentieth century.
Soros ignores the fact that the adoption of free-market policies by states around the world in the late twentieth century increased standards of living for many people.
Soros fails to recognize that governments across the world have been reluctant to reduce subsidies for many local industries.

content.answer: Soros ignores the fact that the adoption of free-market policies by states around the world in the late twentieth century increased standards of living for many people.
